body:
I am no longer going to be playing Avicus or being involved with it by anyway,
At the moment I have gone through this hard time being banned.
At the moment I am trying to recieve support but my teamspeak is dieing all of the time so I can't seem to receive it.

I used to be friendly, fun and I hope enjoyable to play with.

I would like to thank these people:

SnowSX3 - Being a great friend to me and supporting me all of the way and correcting me so I don't do wrong and receive 8 pages of infractions

Straightened - I am thanking this person for 2 reasons... 1. when I need support I know I can always look up to this person. 2. I just love his sense of humor

OPTOBAT - Always encouraging me to never give up and always giving helpful information.

Jkawesome - He is awesome. And Always supports me and being friendly to me I think this is the best friend I have ever encountered on Avicus

Harryrules2002 - Knowing him well I played many jokes and fun time with him. Until a little bit at the end!

finally this will be the FINAL thread I will ever make on Avicus if events don't turn. So I guess I have to say good bye Avicus. I will miss you. I will miss Nebula, Nexus & Avicade. I will miss all of the players on Avicus and will never be let down. I will only post for the next 12 days. So if you want to ask me something please ask it.

Edit: I will still post on the forums but not often

replies.body:
Thanks man, i am always willing to help in any way, but looks like this is goodbye :(
Such miserable and sad news to hear man, but if this is what you feel needs to happen, so be it :/
Anyway, it's been an absolute pleasure and awesome time chatting in posts and seeing you in game :)
Good luck with everything in your life! - Fred (OPTOBAT)
